channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report E-2023100487
item.description:
Report E-2023100487

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: Miami
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ATLAS AIR WORLDWIDE HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 7 October 2023 an aircraft engine (engine type CF6-80C2) was prepared as UN3528. The engine was loaded on the aircraft and during the cargo inspection it was discovered that the engine was leaking. The spill was contained to the aircraft engine stand/pallet. While the aircraft engine was on the aircraft the protective tarp was lifted to inspect the engine, and more leakage was discovered. The engine was removed from the aircraft.

item.title: Report E-2023100434
item.description:
Report E-2023100434

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: DORAL
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING SCREENING PROCESS OF A PREBUILT UNIT (PBE) ULD AAY07359UPS OFFERED TO UPS AIR CARGO SERVICES IN MIAMI, FLORIDA GOING TO COLOMBIA, WE DISCOVERED FIVE BOXES LOADED INSIDE THE ULD CONTAINING DANGEROUS GOODS. THERE ARE FOUR BOXES WITH LTD QTY MARKINGS CUT OUT BUT CONTENTS ARE AEROSOL PLEXI-CLEAR CLEANER. ONE ADDITIONAL BOX IS UNMARKED FROM THE OUTSIDE BUT THE INNER BOX CONTAINS A GROUND PACKAGE THAT HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED A GROUND ACCEPTANCE AUDIT. THE BOX CONTAINS THREE GALLONS OF UN1133 ADHESIVES, PG II. THESE ARE SMALL PACKAGES CONTAINED WITHIN THE AIR CONTAINER. DANGEROUS GOODS ARE PROHIBITED IN ALL PREBUILT UNITS. AN INVESTIGATION WITH THE SHIPPER IS ONGOING.

item.title: Report X-2023090910
item.description:
Report X-2023090910

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-16
  • City: COCOA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When the package was being unloaded from a trailer, it was discovered that it had been leaking. It was immediately placed in a double-lined hazmat bin and moved to a well-ventilated area. DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: It was immediately placed in a double-lined hazmat bin and moved to a well-ventilated area.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box was put in a plastic bag and given to VSA from van line. Box was taken to damage cage and inspection found the cap loose. DescribePack: Cap loose on top of container DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection, box and contents were placed in a hazmat bag and salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023090671
item.description:
Report X-2023090671

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T15:12:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package arrived already wet to the station then it was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: Both plastic bottles of Paramount Super Concentrated Machine Dishwash leaked from loose caps. The bottles have a seal but the caps were not secured. No padding or inner packaging materials were used. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023080439
item.description:
Report X-2023080439

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: Hollywood
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A fiberboard box was found damaged at the HWOA facility. The fiberboard box contained a shipment packaged with dry ice. The corner of the shipment was damaged and pieces of dry ice were falling out. The consignee picked up the shipment form the location.
